{\footnotesize\ttfamily std\+::optional$<$ double $>$ Gps\+Sensor\+Model\+::p (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{const Eigen\+::\+Vector3f \&}]{x }\end{DoxyParamCaption})\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [inline]}, {\ttfamily [override]}, {\ttfamily [virtual]}}



Determine p(z\+\_\+k, x\+\_\+k). This is the chance that this sensor reading (z\+\_\+k) would occur given the robot would be at that particle (x\+\_\+k).

\Hypertarget{class_gps_sensor_model_abd0fa91ecf89e4ca36aab41c2c60126e}\label{class_gps_sensor_model_abd0fa91ecf89e4ca36aab41c2c60126e} 
\index{GpsSensorModel@{GpsSensorModel}!update@{update}}
\index{update@{update}!GpsSensorModel@{GpsSensorModel}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{update()}{update()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily void Gps\+Sensor\+Model\+::update (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}{ }\end{DoxyParamCaption})\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [inline]}, {\ttfamily [override]}, {\ttfamily [virtual]}}



Update object with sensor readings, this function is called every frame (\texorpdfstring{$\sim$}{\string~}10ms) and should be used to stash expensive, one time computations before all the particles are calculated, this always runs before p(x) each frame. 



Implements \mbox{\hyperlink{class_sensor_model_a28672cf65d6e6a9bc967e5661d26e21e}{Sensor\+Model}}.
